alert: Expect mostly sunny weather from December 18 to 19 with highs of 17.3°C and 19.5°C respectively, but a chance of light rain is expected from December 20 onwards with precipitation chances ranging from 39% to 63% on different days. A significant drop in temperature is expected on December 21 with a high of 15.5°C and a chance of moderate rain, while the rest of the week will see partly cloudy skies with varying chances of light rain. Wind gusts are expected to increase from December 22 onwards, ranging from 19.1 km/h to 36.0 km/h, with mostly sunny skies returning by December 24.
